description.p: ECWolf is an advanced source port for Wolfenstein 3D, Spear of Destiny, and Super 3D Noah's Ark, based on the Wolf4SDL codebase. It integrates features from ZDoom, providing powerful modding capabilities without requiring source code modifications. Instead of replacing entire data sets, ECWolf allows for modular additions—such as new weapons—without the need to redistribute all game assets. Mods are packaged into single files, similar to Doom mods, making them easy to manage.

For players, ECWolf enhances the classic experience with modern improvements, including customizable controls, widescreen support, and unlimited save slots. A single ECWolf installation can play all supported games, keeping game data neatly organized. Future updates aim to expand support to additional Wolfenstein-engine games.

ul.li: A single binary supports Wolfenstein 3D, Spear of Destiny, and Super 3D Noah's Ark
Modern control schemes, including mouse and gamepad support
Automap inspired by Super 3D Noah's Ark, Rise of the Triad, and Mac Wolfenstein 3D
Widescreen and tall-screen support with aspect ratio correction (Hor+/Vert+)
High-resolution texture support and mixed-definition assets
Additional image and archive format support
LAN multiplayer for up to 11 players

description.p: ECWolf requires original game files (IWADs) to run. Copy the required game data files to:
$XDG_CONFIG_HOME will be $HOME/.config or $HOME/.var/app/org.ecwolf.ECWolf/config, depending on your installation method.
For a full list of supported IWADs and required files, including MD5 checksums, refer to the ECWolf Wiki
